item.title: By: Balerion
item.dc:creator: Balerion
item.description: I caught the little bastard and he produced three furious Mr. Pinchys. Now, I just fish for the consumables and if I catch another Mr. Pinchy I'm busting out the butter and plastic bib.
item.content:encoded: I caught the little bastard and he produced three furious Mr. Pinchys. Now, I just fish for the consumables and if I catch another Mr. Pinchy I’m busting out the butter and plastic bib.

item.title: By: Annalyze

item.description: Damn your post...I ended up hitting ebay after reading that site and buying a fishing chair card. Haha
item.content:encoded: Damn your post…I ended up hitting ebay after reading that site and buying a fishing chair card. Haha

item.description: Very helpful guide. Thankee for da link.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
I'm one of those disgustingly lucky people who saw a highland mixed pool, thought oooh what's that and got Mr Pinchy first cast XD
1st wish he got angry, wish I'd done that somewhere more interesting...like Kara, 2nd was the gift of 4/5 health and mana pots and 3rd time lucky I got the crawdad pet, I loves my crawdad, especially trying to keep up with the mount :D
item.content:encoded:
I’m one of those disgustingly lucky people who saw a highland mixed pool, thought oooh what’s that and got Mr Pinchy first cast XD

1st wish he got angry, wish I’d done that somewhere more interesting…like Kara, 2nd was the gift of 4/5 health and mana pots and 3rd time lucky I got the crawdad pet, I loves my crawdad, especially trying to keep up with the mount ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Sako
item.dc:creator: Sako
item.description: Oh man, I've caught two Mr. Pinchys and had no luck getting the pet -- and then people started crowding the pools trying to get the actual crawdads for tanking.
item.content:encoded: Oh man, I’ve caught two Mr. Pinchys and had no luck getting the pet — and then people started crowding the pools trying to get the actual crawdads for tanking.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
I HAVE IT!! Muahaha.
That AND the swift razzashi raptor make my female dorfadin highly desirable and envyness :)
Fishing is just excellent anyway...
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Heather

item.description: Darn it, now I want to go back to fishing to catch Mr. Pinchy...
item.content:encoded: Darn it, now I want to go back to fishing to catch Mr. Pinchy…
